Widgets
=======

GXP widgets are a collection of specialized map related components.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :glob:
    
    widgets/*


.. module:: gxp.form
    :synopsis: A collection of grid related classes.


:mod:`gxp.grid`
===============

The :mod:`gxp.grid` module contains classes that extend map related
functionality to ``Ext.grid`` classes.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :glob:
    
    widgets/grid/*
